item.title: [REQ] add a timer to food
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

alright ill help you but explore in client.java more K?
search buryitem
and find it
add if(timer <= 0){
and before the end
timer = XX;
XX is your new timer
and timer is just an example of an int, which you most likely dont have
so use actionTimer, but it might interfere with pking depending on your timers for magic and weapons
edit- also do this for your cases, which can be found like this
case FOODID:
FOODID is the id of the food
itll have something like healing[] = 20;
this is where you change hot much it heals btw
